sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Resume.css' import Header from './Header/Header' import Footer from './Footer/Footer' import Skills from './Skills/Skills' import Education from './Education/Education' import Portfolio from './Portfolio/Portfolio' import Job from './Job/Job' const Resume = () => { const [selectedSkill, setSelectedSkill] = useState(null) const [selectedPort, setSelectedPort] = useState(null) const [selectedEdu, setSelectedEdu] = useState(null) const [selectedJob, setSelectedJob] = useState(null) const toggleSkill = (checkSkill) => { if(selectedSkill === checkSkill) { return setSelectedSkill(null) } setSelectedSkill(checkSkill) } const togglePort = (checkPort) => { if(selectedPort === checkPort) { return setSelectedPort(null) } setSelectedPort(checkPort) } const toggleEdu = (checkEdu) => { if(selectedEdu === checkEdu) { return setSelectedEdu(null) } setSelectedEdu(checkEdu) } const toggleJob = (checkJob) => { if(selectedJob === checkJob) { return setSelectedJob(null) } setSelectedJob(checkJob) } return (
toggleSkill("skill")}>

SKILLS

{selectedSkill === "skill" ? "-" : "+"}
toggleEdu("edu")}>

EDUCATION

{selectedEdu === "edu" ? "-" : "+"}
togglePort("port")}>

PORTFOLIO

{selectedPort === "port" ? "-" : "+"}
toggleJob("job")}>

EXPERIENCE

{selectedJob === "job" ? "-" : "+"}
) } export default Resume
